name: Construction_Site_Fort_Lytton
description:
This is a experience set on the military base of Fort Lytton. there is a lot of assets you can have fun with and just enjoy when your playing with a few friends. 

your set in a present day Fort Lytton which is currently in the process of getting fixed up. you get to teleport around and just play with the tools and other construction site equipment which can be a lot of fun for you the player to experience.
